body: { "<leader>osa", "<cmd>ScissorsAddNewSnippet<cr>", desc = printf("Scissors Add New Snippet"), mode = { "n", "v" }, icon = "" },
{ "<leader>ose", "<cmd>ScissorsEditSnippet<cr>", desc = printf("Scissors Edit Snippet"), mode = "n", icon = "" },
-- { "s", mode = { "n", "x", "o" }, desc = printf("description") }, -- DEL: just an example.
-- DEL: this will makes the buggy missing keymaps to be gone.
-- DEL: uncomment to use examples below.
-- DEL: buffer = 0 is needed to not make it merge with other keymaps when opening other filetypes.
-- DEL: this will create local keymaps for that specific filetype.
-- DEL: remove the auto cmd and buffer = 0 if used for all filetypes.
